Name: IS talking
Ingredients: 30 ml Thomas Henry Tonic Water chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
TOP with tonic water and briefly stir.
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: A brandy and green-based G&T with a zesty citrus influence.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Hans Berendijk at Buster's Bar in Amsterdam, Netherlands.
Nutrition: One serving of IS talking contains 163 calories
